bibl.title: Report on the 37th Season of Excavation and Restoration on the Island of Elephantine.
bibl.note: 37th season of the German Institute of Archaeology and the Swiss Institute for Architectural and Archaeological Research on Ancient Egypt at Elephantine, October 19th, 2007 - April 23rd, 2008. - See in part. pp. 347-349: 3. The Khnum Temple Precinct in the Ptolemaic-Roman period (Felix Arnold); - 353-356: 8. Studies on the fragments of Ptolemaic and Roman temples in Elephantine and Aswan.

bibl.title: Annales du Service des antiquités d'Égypte

bibl.seg: Dietrich Raue et alii, Report on the 37th Season of Excavation and Restoration on the Island of Elephantine.

37th season of the German Institute of Archaeology and the Swiss Institute for Architectural and Archaeological Research on Ancient Egypt at Elephantine, October 19th, 2007 - April 23rd, 2008. - See in part. pp. 347-349: 3. The Khnum Temple Precinct in the Ptolemaic-Roman period (Felix Arnold); - 353-356: 8. Studies on the fragments of Ptolemaic and Roman temples in Elephantine and Aswan.
